amendment.description: Amendment strikes section 42011 relating to the prepayment of premium liability for coal industry health benefits.
amendment.purpose: An amedment numbered 21 printed in House Report 108-69.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cantor amendment Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A021) offered by Mr. Cantor.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Cantor amendment Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
